ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of BRIAN P. GOODMAN of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Head Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective June 20, 2007.
